an5.163:4.1: Tatra kho āyasmā sāriputto bhikkhū āmantesi:
an5.163:4.3: “Āvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato sāriputtassa paccassosuṃ.
an5.163:5.1: * “Pañcahāvuso, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṃ sākaccho sabrahmacārīnaṃ.
an5.163:5.3: Idhāvuso, bhikkhu attanā ca sīlasampanno hoti, sīlasampadākathāya ca āgataṃ pañhaṃ byākattā hoti;
an5.163:5.4: attanā ca samādhisampanno hoti, samādhisampadākathāya ca āgataṃ pañhaṃ byākattā hoti;
an5.163:5.5: attanā ca paññāsampanno hoti, paññāsampadākathāya ca āgataṃ pañhaṃ byākattā hoti;
an5.163:5.6: attanā ca vimuttisampanno hoti, vimuttisampadākathāya ca āgataṃ pañhaṃ byākattā hoti;
an5.163:5.7: attanā ca vimuttiñāṇadassanasampanno hoti, vimuttiñāṇadassanasampadākathāya ca āgataṃ pañhaṃ byākattā hoti.
an5.163:5.8: Imehi kho, āvuso, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṃ sākaccho sabrahmacārīnan”ti.
